email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for reaching out. For this shipment, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.50 per MT. The vessel we have in mind is the MT Oceanic, DWT 120,000, LOA 250m. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the quick response. My client is considering the offer but is hoping for a rate closer to $49.75 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I understand your client's position. We can adjust the rate to $50.00 per MT, but that's our best offer. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the update. My client has agreed to the $50.00 per MT rate. Please confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and the vessel details. Also, could you send over the draft charter party for review? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, great news. The laycan of 15-20 October is confirmed, and the vessel is MT Oceanic, DWT 120,000, LOA 250m. I'll send over the draft charter party shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the confirmation. I'll review the charter party and get back to you if there are any comments. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best, Sarah
